item.title: The Best Thing About the New York Times’s 100 Notable Books List
item.description: The paper of record drops its biggest reading list, Bookshop names the Best of 2025, and what to read if you love Pluribus.

item.title: The New York Times Shares Their 100 Notable Books of 2025
item.description: From literary fiction to nonfiction to "dazzlingly weird fiction," here are the 100 notable books of 2025, according to The New York Times.

item.title: The Only Short Book You Need to Squeeze In at Year’s End
item.description: If you're looking for a quick quality read to close out the year, you'll want to check out this funny, biting crime thriller.

item.title: Gifts for Book Clubs
item.description: There are ward-nominated books perfect for book clubs, cookbooks, and a few non-bookish items to enhance the reading experience.

item.title: The Library Card Formerly Known As Prince and Other Library News
item.description: From the new Prince-themed library card in Minnesota to the types of rest librarians actually need, catch up on the latest in the world of library new...
